short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Spirited Away wallpaper turn new tab to HD Spirited Away background. Custom Spirited Away wallpaper theme for anime fans.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Extension Features:

1. Automatically change the Spirited Away wallpaper each time you open a new tab.
2. Select or mark as favorite Spirited Away backgrounds from the wallpaper chooser.
3. Integrated search bar powered by Google.
4. Quick links to your email and social media profiles.
5. Display the current date and time automatically.
6. Create notes for task management directly in the new tab.
7. Convenient links to your most frequently visited sites.
8. Simplified access to your bookmarked pages.
9. Shortcut panel customization for frequently visited websites.
10. Direct links to Google applications.
11. Access to additional themes with ease.
12. Effortless sharing options to social media.
13. One-click wallpaper downloads.
14. Instant access to games.
15. Activate entertaining animations like snow, rain, falling leaves, or fireworks in the Spirited Away new tab.
